en.title: FE's Event Attended by 2000! Photos on 2nd August 2008 Event Kuala Lumpur (1).
en.content: Dr. Amir Farid’s seminar on “Benefits of Quantum Pendant and Scalar Energy” was attended by a capacity audience at FE’s HQ on Thursday 6th March 2008. FE is honored and privileged to have both  of Malaysia’s foremost experts on Scalar Energy; Dr Amir Farid and Dr Siva on board FE’s winning team.

meta.description: Dr. Amir Farid’s seminar on “Benefits of Quantum Pendant and Scalar Energy” was attended by a capacity audience at FE’s HQ on Thursday 6th March 2008. FE is honored and privileged to have both of Malaysia’s foremost experts on Scalar Energy; Dr Amir Farid and Dr Siva on board FE’s winning team.
meta.author: klhunter

bm.title: Christmas Buffet Dinner Hosted By Rachel Thomas!

meta.description: FE Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas recently hosted a Christmas Buffet Dinner to a packed house at FE HQ on 23rd December 2008 for her group and staff of FE. FE would like to say a BIG thank you to Rachel for her generosity and for spreading Christmas cheer to her group and to FE staff during this festive season!
meta.keyword: Christmas Buffet Dinner Hosted By Rachel Thomas!
meta.author: klhunter
